short_desc: Offers a regular reliable means to check on the safety of seniors who isolated homebound or people need the reassurance of regular contact. Telecare volunteers call their clients each weekday morning to verify the clients well being.
description: Offers a regular reliable means to check on the safety of seniors who isolated homebound or people need the reassurance of regular contact. Telecare volunteers call their clients each weekday morning to verify the clients well being. All free of charge.
